== Conxem (626862) ==
      
Conxem is a village in the [[Ponda]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 778.35 hectares and harbouring 39 households with total population of 186 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PONDA]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 94 and female population is 92. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626862<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 137
* Literate male population: 77 (81.91%)
* Literate female population: 60 (65.22%)
